text: Pygmalion is a television movie from 1983. It was produced by Margot Kidder. Kidder also stars in the movie, which also stars Peter O'Toole as Professor Henry Higgins. It received many positive reviews. It was based on George Bernard Shaw's play Pygmalion. It was released on July 14, 1983. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1983 movies Category:American television movies Category:Movies based on plays
title: Pygmalion (1983 movie)
